channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- Secure Access Client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- Secure Access Client

item.title: CVE-2023-38042|2024-05-31T17:38:31.427Z -- Ivanti -- Secure Access Client
item.description: A local privilege escalation vulnerability in Ivanti Secure Access Client for Windows allows a low privileged user to execute code as SYSTEM.
